name: Ugh, My Prince Might Die Here
name_original: Ugh, My Prince Might Die Here
description:
Gosh darn it, your prince was kidnapped! What are you going to do now?

In this game, you try to save your lovely boyfriend from a deadly dungeon.

Snakes, cultists, and what appears to be gelatin (which might not be edible) will try to stop you, but fear not!

Between each level, the shopkeeper will offer you many items. But only a roll of the die will decide if you'll actually get what you want.  At first, it'll be cheap but you might not get what you want. But further on it'll be more likely you'll get what you what but at a pricier cost.
You can check how likely are you going to get your item by checking the dice meter.

So, why not give it a shot? Will you roll the dice of luck and save your prince?

Important:
RNG is based on a 6-sided die. Nearly if not everything from enemy movement to levels is generated around this. If you feel like you're having bad luck it is ok to restart the game. you can always press R to restart the room or shift+R to restart the entire thing and reset the RNG seed.

If you are still frustrated remember that you are always cooler than whoever made this game.

Credits:
